foreignData.name: Kinzu vom trostlosen Zirkel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn eine andere Nichtspielsteinkreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen und sie ins Exil schicken. Falls du dies tust, erzeuge einen Spielstein, der eine Kopie jener Kreatur ist, außer dass er 1/1 ist und Toxisch 1 hat. (Spieler, denen von einer solchen Kreatur Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem eine Giftmarke.)

foreignData.name: Kinzu del Pacto Lóbrego
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que otra criatura que no sea ficha que controlas muera, puedes pagar 2 vidas y exiliarla. Si lo haces, crea una ficha que es una copia de esa criatura, excepto que es 1/1 y tiene la habilidad de tóxico 1. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de ella también obtienen un contador de veneno.)

foreignData.name: Kinzu de Mornecouvent
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois qu'une autre créature non-jeton que vous contrôlez meurt, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie et l'exiler. Si vous faites ainsi, créez un jeton qui est une copie de cette créature, excepté qu'il est 1/1 et qu'il a toxique 1. (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de ce jeton gagnent aussi un marqueur « poison ».)

foreignData.name: Kinzu della Tetra Congrega
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura non pedina che controlli muore, puoi pagare 2 punti vita ed esiliarla. Se lo fai, crea una pedina che è una copia di quella creatura, tranne che è 1/1 e ha tossico 1. (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da questa creatura ottengono anche un segnalino veleno.)

foreignData.name: 冷たき集いのキンズー
foreignData.text:
飛行
あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでもこれでもないクリーチャー１体が死亡するたび、あなたは「２点のライフを支払い、それを追放する。」を選んでもよい。そうしたなら、１/１であり毒性１を持つことを除き、そのクリーチャーのコピーであるトークン１つを生成する。（それに戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター１個を得る。）
foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・吸血鬼

foreignData.name: Kinzu do Conventículo Sombrio
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que uma criatura não ficha que você controla morre, você pode pagar 2 pontos de vida e exilá-la. Se fizer isso, crie uma ficha que seja uma cópia daquela criatura, exceto por ser 1/1 e ter tóxico 1. (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate dessa criatura também recebem um marcador de veneno.)

foreignData.name: 峻集的琴祖
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当另一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以支付2点生命并将它放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但它是1/1且具有下毒1。（受到其战斗伤害的牌手还会得到一个中毒指示物。）
foreignData.type: 传奇生物 ～非瑞人／吸血鬼

mainBoard.name: Kinzu of the Bleak Coven
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay 2 life and exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's 1/1 and has toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by it also get a poison counter.)

rulings.text: A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action and doesn't use the stack. In other words, it happens immediately and players can't respond to it, just like a player losing the game due to having 0 or less life.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any "as [this creature] enters the battlefield" or "[this creature] enters the battlefield with" abilities of the creature will also work.
Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.

Except for the listed exceptions, the token copies exactly what was printed on the original creature and nothing else (unless that creature is copying something else; see below). It doesn't copy whether that creature was tapped or untapped, whether it had any counters on it or Auras or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that had changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.
If something becomes a copy of the token, the copy also has base power and toughness 1/1 and has toxic 1.
If the copied creature had {X} in its mana cost, X is 0.
If the copied creature was copying something else, then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied, with the exceptions noted above.

If the token is a copy of a creature whose power and toughness are defined by an ability (usually printed as */* or similar), the token doesn't copy the ability that defines its power and toughness. It remains a 1/1 creature.

Multiple instances of toxic are cumulative. For example, if a creature has toxic 2 and gains toxic 1 due to another effect, combat damage that creature deals to a player will cause that player to get 3 poison counters.
The token copies the creature as it last existed on the battlefield before it died, not as it existed in the graveyard before it was exiled.

Toxic doesn't change the amount of combat damage a creature deals. For example, if a 2/2 creature with toxic 1 deals combat damage to a player, that creature will deal 2 damage. The results of that damage are the player loses 2 life and gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay 2 life and exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's 1/1 and has toxic 1. (Players dealt combat damage by it also get a poison counter.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Even the most insignificant creature can be perfected.

foreignData.flavorText: Selbst das unbedeutendste Geschöpf kann perfektioniert werden.
foreignData.name: Leichenfledderer-Skirg
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Verdorben — Solange ein Gegner drei oder mehr Giftmarken hat, hat der Leichenfledderer-Skirg Todesberührung und Lebensverknüpfung.

foreignData.flavorText: Hasta la criatura más insignificante puede perfeccionarse.
foreignData.name: Esquirge buscahuesos
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Corrupto — Mientras un oponente tenga tres o más contadores de veneno, el Esquirge buscahuesos tiene las habilidades de toque mortal y vínculo vital.

foreignData.flavorText: Même la créature la plus insignifiante peut être perfectionnée.
foreignData.name: Scrige glaneur d'os
foreignData.text:
Vol
Corrompu — Tant qu'un adversaire a au moins trois marqueurs « poison », le Scrige glaneur d'os a le contact mortel et le lien de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: Persino la più insignificante delle creature può essere perfezionata.
foreignData.name: Skirge Spolpaossa
foreignData.text:
Volare
Corrotto — Fintanto che un avversario ha tre o più segnalini veleno, lo Skirge Spolpaossa ha tocco letale e legame vitale.

foreignData.flavorText: どんなに取るに足らない生物でも完成化は可能だ。
foreignData.name: 骨拾いのスカージ
foreignData.text:
飛行
堕落 ― 対戦相手１人が３個以上の毒カウンターを持っているかぎり、骨拾いのスカージは接死と絆魂を持つ。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・インプ

foreignData.flavorText: Até a criatura mais insignificante pode ser aperfeiçoada.
foreignData.name: Eskirge Pegaosso
foreignData.text:
Voar
Corrompido — Enquanto um oponente tiver três ou mais marcadores de veneno, Eskirge Pegaosso terá toque mortífero e vínculo com a vida.

foreignData.flavorText: 就连最不起眼的生物，也能臻至完美。
foreignData.name: 拣骨斯克魔
foreignData.text:
飞行
腐化～只要某对手具有三个或更多中毒指示物，拣骨斯克魔便具有死触与系命异能。

mainBoard.name: Bonepicker Skirge
mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Corrupted — As long as an opponent has three or more poison counters, Bonepicker Skirge has deathtouch and lifelink.
mainBoard.text:
Flying
Corrupted — As long as an opponent has three or more poison counters, Bonepicker Skirge has deathtouch and lifelink.

mainBoard.flavorText: The praetors of the other Spheres privately wonder how Sheoldred always has a surplus of glistening oil at her disposal.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Prätoren der anderen Sphären fragen sich heimlich, wie Sheoldred es schafft, immer noch etwas mehr Glitzerndes Öl zur Verfügung zu haben.
foreignData.name: Verseuchender Absauger
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Toxisch 1 (Spieler, denen von dieser Kreatur Kampfschaden zugefügt wird, erhalten außerdem eine Giftmarke.)

foreignData.flavorText: Los magistrados de las demás esferas se preguntan en privado cómo hace Sheoldred para tener siempre aceite iridiscente de más a su disposición.
foreignData.name: Extractor pestilente
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Tóxico 1. (Los jugadores que reciben daño de combate de esta criatura también obtienen un contador de veneno.)

foreignData.flavorText: En privé, les praetors des autres Sphères se demandent comment Sheoldred fait pour toujours disposer d'un surplus de pétrole luisant.
foreignData.name: Siphonneur pestiféré
foreignData.text:
Vol
Toxique 1 (Les joueurs qui subissent des blessures de combat de cette créature gagnent aussi un marqueur « poison ».)

foreignData.flavorText: I pretori delle altre Sfere si chiedono in segreto come faccia Sheoldred ad avere sempre a sua disposizione scorte supplementari di olio scintillante.
foreignData.name: Prosciugatore Pestilenziale
foreignData.text:
Volare
Tossico 1 (I giocatori a cui viene inflitto danno da combattimento da questa creatura ottengono anche un segnalino veleno.)

foreignData.flavorText: 他の球層の法務官達は、シェオルドレッドが何故自由に使えるぎらつく油を常に余らせているのか、内心不思議に思っている。
foreignData.name: 伝染させる吸血者
foreignData.text:
飛行
毒性１（このクリーチャーから戦闘ダメージを受けたプレイヤーは追加で毒カウンター１個を得る。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・昆虫

foreignData.flavorText: Os pretores das outras Esferas se perguntam em segredo como Sheoldred sempre tem um excedente de óleo brilhante à disposição.
foreignData.name: Sifonador Pestilento
foreignData.text:
Voar
Tóxico 1 (Os jogadores que sofrem dano de combate desta criatura também recebem um marcador de veneno.)

foreignData.flavorText: 其他狱界的魔判官私底下都想搞清楚，为何希欧蕊手边总有用不完的烁油。
foreignData.name: 瘟疫汲取蝇
foreignData.text:
飞行
下毒1（受此生物战斗伤害的牌手还会得到一个中毒指示物。）

mainBoard.originalText:
Flying
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.

mainBoard.text:
Flying
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)

mainBoard.flavorText: She proudly carries the weight of Phyrexia's creed, both figuratively and literally.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie trägt stolz das Gewicht von Phyrexias Heiliger Schrift, sowohl im wörtlichen als auch im übertragenen Sinne.
foreignData.name: Trägerin des Testaments
foreignData.text: Wenn die Trägerin des Testaments stirbt, schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: Carga orgullosa con el peso del credo de Pirexia, literal y metafóricamente.
foreignData.name: Portadora de testamentos
foreignData.text: Cuando la Portadora de testamentos muera, mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y el resto en tu cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle porte fièrement le fardeau du crédo de Phyrexia, à la fois littéralement et figurativement.
foreignData.name: Porteuse de testament
foreignData.text: Quand la Porteuse de testament meurt, regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'elles dans votre main et le reste dans votre cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Porta con orgoglio il fardello del credo di Phyrexia, sia in senso figurato che letterale.
foreignData.name: Portatrice del Testamento
foreignData.text: Quando la Portatrice del Testamento muore, guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女はファイレクシアの信条を誇らしげに背負っている。比喩的にも文字通りにも。
foreignData.name: 証を携える者
foreignData.text: 証を携える者が死亡したとき、あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード３枚を見る。そのうちの１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ファイレクシアン・戦士

foreignData.flavorText: Ela carrega orgulhosamente o peso do credo de Phyrexia, tanto figurativa quanto literalmente.
foreignData.name: Porta-testamento
foreignData.text: Quando Porta-testamento morrer, olhe os três cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque um deles em sua mão e o restante em seu cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: 她光荣承担非瑞克西亚信条之重～无论精神上或肉体上皆是如此。
foreignData.name: 负约徒
foreignData.text: 当负约徒死去时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。

mainBoard.name: Testament Bearer
mainBoard.originalText: When Testament Bearer dies, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
mainBoard.text: When Testament Bearer dies, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText: By gaze, sting, and claw, Vraska will see the will of Phyrexia done.

foreignData.flavorText: Ob mit Blick, Stachel oder Klauen: Vraska wird Phyrexias Willen durchsetzen.
foreignData.name: Vernichtender Blick
foreignData.text:
Bezahle {4} oder opfere ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur als zusätzliche Kosten, um diesen Zauberspruch zu wirken.
Zerstöre eine Kreatur oder einen Planeswalker deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText: Vraska hará que se cumpla la voluntad de Pirexia, ya sea con su mirada, su aguijón o sus garras.
foreignData.name: Mirada aniquiladora
foreignData.text:
Como coste adicional para lanzar este hechizo, paga {4} o sacrifica un artefacto o criatura.
Destruye la criatura o planeswalker objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: Que ce soit par son regard, son dard ou ses griffes, Vraska accomplira la volonté de Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Regard annihilateur
foreignData.text:
En tant que coût supplémentaire pour lancer ce sort, payez {4} ou sacrifiez un artefact ou une créature.
Détruisez une cible, créature ou planeswalker.

foreignData.flavorText: Con lo sguardo, il pungiglione e l'artiglio, Vraska vedrà compiuta la volontà di Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Sguardo Annientatore
foreignData.text:
Come costo addizionale per lanciare questa magia, paga {4} o sacrifica un artefatto o una creatura.
Distruggi una creatura o un planeswalker bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 眼差し、棘、爪を以てファイレクシアの意志が成されるさまを、ヴラスカは目撃することになる。
foreignData.name: 滅殺の眼差し
foreignData.text:
この呪文を唱えるための追加コストとして、{4}を支払うか、アーティファクトやクリーチャーのうち１つを生け贄に捧げる。
クリーチャーやプレインズウォーカーのうち１体を対象とする。それを破壊する。

foreignData.flavorText: Com seu olhar, seus ferrões e suas garras, Vraska realizará a vontade de Phyrexia.
foreignData.name: Olhar Aniquilador
foreignData.text:
Como custo adicional para conjurar esta mágica, pague {4} ou sacrifique um artefato ou uma criatura.
Destrua a criatura ou o planeswalker alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: 瞪视、毒刺、利爪，瓦丝卡总有办法确保非瑞克西亚意志得以贯彻。
foreignData.name: 歼灭瞪视
foreignData.text:
支付{4}或牺牲一个神器或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。
消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。

mainBoard.name: Annihilating Glare
mainBoard.originalText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
mainBoard.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay {4} or sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.

mainBoard.flavorText: Many vatkeepers use necrogen etchings to judge the value of their aspirants. If the wounds rot and fester, the recipient is not worth further effort.

foreignData.flavorText: Viele Bottichwächter verwenden Nekrogen-Ätzungen, um den Wert ihrer Aspiranten zu beurteilen. Wenn die Wunden faulen und eitern, ist der Kandidat keine weiteren Mühen wert.
foreignData.name: Salbung der Qualen
foreignData.text:
Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ins Exil, falls ihr Manabetrag 3 oder weniger ist.
Verdorben — Schicke die Kreatur stattdessen ins Exil, falls ihr Beherrscher drei oder mehr Giftmarken hat.

foreignData.flavorText: Muchos guardianes de tanques usan grabados de necrógeno para juzgar el valor de los aspirantes. Si las heridas se pudren y supuran, el receptor no vale la pena.
foreignData.name: Ungir con aflicción
foreignData.text:
Exilia la criatura objetivo si tiene un valor de maná de 3 o menos.
Corrupto — En vez de eso, exilia esa criatura si su controlador tiene tres o más contadores de veneno.

foreignData.flavorText: Bon nombre de gardecuves recourent aux scarifications nécrogènes pour juger de la valeur de leurs aspirants. Si les blessures s'infectent et suppurent, ils n'en valent pas la peine.
foreignData.name: Consécration par l'affliction
foreignData.text:
Exilez une créature ciblée si elle a une valeur de mana inférieure ou égale à 3.
Corrompu — Exilez cette créature à la place si son contrôleur a au moins trois marqueurs « poison ».

foreignData.flavorText: Molti custodi delle vasche usano incisioni necrogene per giudicare il valore dei loro aspiranti. Se le ferite si infettano e incancreniscono, il destinatario non vale ulteriori sforzi.
foreignData.name: Consacrare con l'Afflizione
foreignData.text:
Esilia una creatura bersaglio se ha valore di mana pari o inferiore a 3.
Corrotto — Esilia invece quella creatura se il suo controllore ha tre o più segnalini veleno.

foreignData.flavorText: 槽の守り人の多くは、有貌体の価値を測るために屍気による腐食を利用する。傷口が腐って化膿するなら、これ以上被験者に手を施すほどの価値はない。
foreignData.name: 苦痛ある選定
foreignData.text:
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それのマナ総量が３以下であるなら、それを追放する。
堕落 — そのクリーチャーのコントローラーが３個以上の毒カウンターを持っているなら、代わりにそれを追放する。

foreignData.flavorText: Muitos guardiões dos tanques fazem incisões com necrogênio em seus aspirantes para julgar seu valor. Se os ferimentos apodrecem e supuram, o receptor não vale esforços ulteriores.
foreignData.name: Ungir com Aflição
foreignData.text:
Exile a criatura alvo se esta tiver valor de mana igual ou inferior a 3.
Corrompido — Em vez disso, exile aquela criatura se seu controlador tiver três ou mais marcadores de veneno.

foreignData.flavorText: 许多司缸依据望化兽身上的化尸瘴蚀刻来判断其价值。如果其身上伤口腐败溃烂，就没必要继续投入精力。
foreignData.name: 折磨赐圣
foreignData.text:
如果目标生物的法术力值等于或小于3，则放逐之。
腐化～如果该生物的操控者具有三个或更多中毒指示物，则改为放逐该生物。

mainBoard.name: Anoint with Affliction
mainBoard.originalText:
Exile target creature if it has mana value 3 or less.
Corrupted — Exile that creature instead if its controller has three or more poison counters.

rulings.text: As Anoint with Affliction resolves, if the creature's controller has three or more poison counters, the creature will be exiled no matter what its mana value is. If the controller doesn't, the creature will be exiled only if its mana value is 3 or less.
You may choose to target a creature that has mana value greater than 3 even if no player has three of more poison counters.

mainBoard.text:
Exile target creature if it has mana value 3 or less.
Corrupted — Exile that creature instead if its controller has three or more poison counters.

mainBoard.flavorText: The Mirran forces thought they'd vanquished their foes . . . until a nearby monument got up and started stalking toward them.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Mirran-Streitkräfte dachten, sie hätten ihre Gegner bezwungen … Bis ein Denkmal in der Nähe plötzlich aufstand und auf sie zuwankte.
foreignData.name: Wanderndes Bauwerk
foreignData.text: Wenn das Wandernde Bauwerk ins Spiel kommt, kannst du 2 Lebenspunkte bezahlen. Wenn du dies tust, erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl -1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignData.flavorText: Las fuerzas mirrodianas pensaban que habían vencido a sus enemigos..., hasta que un monumento cercano se levantó y empezó a avanzar hacia ellas.
foreignData.name: Construcción ambulante
foreignData.text: Cuando la Construcción ambulante entre al campo de batalla, puedes pagar 2 vidas. Cuando lo hagas, la criatura objetivo obtiene -1/-1 hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Les forces mirranes pensaient avoir vaincu leurs ennemis... jusqu'à ce qu'un monument se dresse et s'avance dans leur direction.
foreignData.name: Édifice ambulant
foreignData.text: Quand l'Édifice ambulant arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez payer 2 points de vie. Quand vous faites ainsi, une créature ciblée gagne -1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Le forze Mirran pensavano di aver sconfitto i loro nemici... Poi un monumento nelle vicinanze si alzò e iniziò a muoversi verso di loro.
foreignData.name: Edificio Ambulatorio
foreignData.text: Quando l'Edificio Ambulatorio entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi pagare 2 punti vita. Quando lo fai, una creatura bersaglio prende -1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: ミラディン軍が敵を打ち負かしたと思っていたのは、近くの記念碑が立ち上がり、彼らに向かって歩き出すまでだった。

rulings.text: You don't choose a target for Ambulatory Edifice's last ability at the time it triggers. Rather, a second "reflexive" ability triggers when you pay 2 life this way. You choose a target for that ability as it goes on the stack. Each player may respond to this triggered ability as normal.

mainBoard.name: Nimraiser Paladin
mainBoard.originalText:
Toxic 2 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get two poison counters.)
When Nimraiser Paladin enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.

rulings.text: A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game. This is a state-based action and doesn't use the stack. In other words, it happens immediately and players can't respond to it, just like a player losing the game due to having 0 or less life.
Any other effects of that damage, such as life gain from lifelink, still apply.

Conversely, replacement effects that apply to the number of counters put on a player can modify the counters placed this way. For example, Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider's last two abilities can apply to counters placed this way.

Damage dealt by a creature with toxic grants the same number of counters regardless of how much damage is dealt. Notably, if a replacement effect modifies the damage in some way (such as that of Gratuitous Violence), the number of counters given remains unchanged.
If a creature with toxic deals combat damage to a creature or planeswalker, or if it deals noncombat damage, toxic has no effect and no player gets poison counters.

Multiple instances of toxic are cumulative. For example, if a creature has toxic 2 and gains toxic 1 due to another effect, combat damage that creature deals to a player will cause that player to get 3 poison counters.

Toxic doesn't change the amount of combat damage a creature deals. For example, if a 2/2 creature with toxic 1 deals combat damage to a player, that creature will deal 2 damage. The results of that damage are the player loses 2 life and gets a poison counter.

mainBoard.text:
Toxic 2 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get two poison counters.)

mainBoard.name: Drown in Ichor
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

rulings.text: An ability that triggers "Whenever you proliferate" triggers even if you chose no permanents or players while doing so.

If a permanent ever has both +1/+1 counters and -1/-1 counters on it at the same time, they're removed in pairs as a state-based action so that the permanent has only one of those kinds of counters on it.

If a player or permanent has more than one kind of counter on it, and you choose for it to get additional counters, it must get one of each kind of counter it already has. You can't have it get just one kind of counter it already has and not the others.

Players can respond to a spell or ability whose effect includes proliferating. Once that spell or ability starts to resolve, however, and its controller chooses which permanents and players will get new counters, it's too late for anyone to respond.

To proliferate, you can choose any permanent that has a counter, including ones controlled by opponents. You can choose any player who has a counter, including opponents. You can't choose cards in any zone other than the battlefield, even if they have counters on them.

You don't have to choose every permanent or player that has a counter, only the ones you want to add another counter to. Since "any number" includes zero, you don't have to choose any permanents at all, and you don't have to choose any players at all.

mainBoard.text: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
